attr.title: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
attr.desc: VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action is a booze em' up about waifus, technology, and post-dystopia life. In this world, corporations reign supreme, all human life is infected with nanomachines designed to oppress them, and the terrifying White Knights ensure that everyone obeys the laws..
attr.inst: Copy all game assets from your windows install to `valhalla/assets`.
